headline: Activist Elliott Builds Big Stake in Norwegian Cruise Line
summary: Activist Elliott Investment Management has built a more than 10% stake in  Norwegian Cruise Line  and plans to push for changes to turn the struggling cruise-ship operator around, according to people familiar with the matter.  Elliott, now one of Norwegian’s top investors, is planning to engage with the company to try to help fix its underperformance, the people said.  Its brands include the more premium Oceania Cruises and the luxury Regent Seven Seas Cruises.

content.title: Activist Elliott Builds Big Stake in Norwegian Cruise Line
content.summary: Activist Elliott Investment Management has built a more than 10% stake in  Norwegian Cruise Line  and plans to push for changes to turn the struggling cruise-ship operator around, according to people familiar with the matter.  Elliott, now one of Norwegian’s top investors, is planning to engage with the company to try to help fix its underperformance, the people said.  Its brands include the more premium Oceania Cruises and the luxury Regent Seven Seas Cruises.

headline: Norwegian Cruise Line Stock Jumps. Activist Elliott Takes Stake, Pushes for Big Change.
summary: Norwegian Cruise Line  shares rallied on Tuesday after activist Elliott Investment Management said it had taken a stake of more than 10% in the cruise line operator.  Elliott said in a press release that it had sent a letter to Norwegian’s board outlining the company’s “strategic and execution missteps during a time of strong demand in the cruise industry.”  The activist investor said it believes Norwegian is significantly undervalued despite being a “fundamentally strong business with substantial untapped potential.”

content.title: Norwegian Cruise Line Stock Jumps. Activist Elliott Takes Stake, Pushes for Big Change.
content.summary: Norwegian Cruise Line  shares rallied on Tuesday after activist Elliott Investment Management said it had taken a stake of more than 10% in the cruise line operator.  Elliott said in a press release that it had sent a letter to Norwegian’s board outlining the company’s “strategic and execution missteps during a time of strong demand in the cruise industry.”  The activist investor said it believes Norwegian is significantly undervalued despite being a “fundamentally strong business with substantial untapped potential.”

headline: Why activist investor Elliott is betting on Norwegian Cruise Line
summary: Former Subway CEO John Chidsey was appointed as the new CEO of Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings (NCLH). Additionally, activist investor Elliott Investment Management has taken a 10% stake in the company, providing a list of improvements it would like to see from Norwegian. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma, Northwestern Mutual Wealth Management Company chief investment officer Brent Schutte, and Yahoo Finance Senior Business Reporter Ines Ferré join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss the appointment, the company's turnaround, and more. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

content.title: Why activist investor Elliott is betting on Norwegian Cruise Line
content.description:
Former Subway CEO John Chidsey was appointed as the new CEO of Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings (NCLH). Additionally, activist investor Elliott Investment Management has taken a 10% stake in the company, providing a list of improvements it would like to see from Norwegian.

Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma, Northwestern Mutual Wealth Management Company chief investment officer Brent Schutte, and Yahoo Finance Senior Business Reporter Ines Ferré join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss the appointment, the company's turnaround, and more.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.
content.summary: Former Subway CEO John Chidsey was appointed as the new CEO of Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings (NCLH). Additionally, activist investor Elliott Investment Management has taken a 10% stake in the company, providing a list of improvements it would like to see from Norwegian. Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma, Northwestern Mutual Wealth Management Company chief investment officer Brent Schutte, and Yahoo Finance Senior Business Reporter Ines Ferré join Opening Bid host Brian Sozzi to discuss the appointment, the company's turnaround, and more. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Activist Investor to Press for Norwegian Cruise Line Changes
summary: Activist Elliott Investment Management has assembled a more than 10% stake in Norwegian Cruise Line, and the investor plans to urge changes to turn around the struggling cruise-ship operator. Norwegian is the fourth-largest cruise operator in the world by number of passengers, with a market value of roughly $10 billion.

content.title: Activist Investor to Press for Norwegian Cruise Line Changes
content.summary: Activist Elliott Investment Management has assembled a more than 10% stake in Norwegian Cruise Line, and the investor plans to urge changes to turn around the struggling cruise-ship operator. Norwegian is the fourth-largest cruise operator in the world by number of passengers, with a market value of roughly $10 billion.

headline: Looking At The Narrative For Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings (NCLH) After Activist Stake And CEO Change
summary: Analysts have nudged their average fair value estimate for Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings to US$27.25 from US$27.93, reflecting a modest reset in expectations as new data and fresh views come in. The latest models pair a slightly lower discount rate of 12.31%, down from 12.50%, with a more conservative forward revenue growth assumption of 8.77% versus 9.23%, capturing both optimism around long term cruise demand and caution around regional pressures and execution risks. Stay tuned to see how...
